guide.introduction: They make great Halloween party favors for a classroom party, and trick-or-treaters will love them, too. These Halloween treatsare going to be the hit of any party, so be sure to make plenty!
guide.introduction_rendered: They make great Halloween party favors for a classroom party, and trick-or-treaters will love them, too. These Halloween treatsare going to be the hit of any party, so be sure to make plenty!

lines.text: Take a 6" square of cheesecloth. Place the Dum Dum Pop in the center of the 6" square and wrap the cheesecloth around the lollipop.
lines.text_raw: Take a 6" square of cheesecloth. Place the Dum Dum Pop in the center of the 6" square and wrap the cheesecloth around the lollipop.

lines.text: Secure the cloth with a short length of ribbon and tie in a bow. Take a sharpie and draw a face on the "head." That's it! Is this not one of the easiest Halloween crafts for kids?
lines.text_raw: Secure the cloth with a short length of ribbon and tie in a bow. Take a sharpie and draw a face on the "head." That's it! Is this not one of the easiest Halloween crafts for kids?

lines.text: Take four black pipe cleaners, center over the lollipop to ensure the spider "legs" are even on either side. Wrap the pipe cleaners once around the base of the lollipop, creating four legs on either side. Bend the pipe cleaners to create the spider legs.
lines.text_raw: Take four black pipe cleaners, center over the lollipop to ensure the spider "legs" are even on either side. Wrap the pipe cleaners once around the base of the lollipop, creating four legs on either side. Bend the pipe cleaners to create the spider legs.

lines.text: Glue on the googly eyes to the black "body." You're done. Now you can enjoy these creepy-crawly treats! This Halloween kids craft is easy enough to make with a preschool class.
